product_name: AYG Performance Crew-Neck Shirt - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The AYG Performance Crew-Neck shirt is made from lightweight technical mesh fabric for quick drying, breathable comfort during active sports. Polyester fabric moves moisture quickly away from skin for quick evaporation so you remain dry and comfortable. Antimicrobial finish helps reduce odors. Flatlock seams reduce chafing and increase durability. Closeout.
short_description: The AYG Performance Crew-Neck shirt is made from lightweight technical mesh fabric for quick drying, breathable comfort during active sports.
